preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 24 g of activated carbon. 
 2. Weigh out 6 g of sulfur. 
 3. Weigh out 6 g of selenium. 
 4. Weigh out 144 g of zirconium powder. 
 5. In a clean, dry container, combine all ingredients thoroughly using a spatula until uniformly mixed.
